subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Bloody Mary and Ouija
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
I have done extensive experiences with the Ouija Board. I have never been
able to prove anything except that it is our own minds controlling the
device.

On Mon, Apr 19, 2010 at 8:48 AM, <dc3644@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Hey guys,
>
> I am doing some research on the Bloody Mary ritual and Ouija Boards. I am

> willing to share them - as well as any research and evidence you may have
> gathered from them. I am looking to bring the folklore together with the
> history, science and experience.
>
> Thanks.
>
> Dwayne Claud
> Dwayne@...
>  
>
